meanings.meaning: Confirmation for Extra Stay and Compromise Discount

examples.korean: Hotels are cheaper out of season. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 호텔들이 비수기에는 (숙박비가) 더 저렴하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hotels are cheaper out of season. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The company picked up the tab for his hotel room. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 회사가 그의 호텔 숙박비를 지불했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company picked up the tab for his hotel room. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Please settle your bill before leaving the hotel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 호텔을 떠나시기 전에 숙박비를 다 지불[계산]해 주세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please settle your bill before leaving the hotel. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The price is for accommodation only, exclusive of meals. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 가격은 식사는 제외하고 숙박비만입니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
